title: [Health] COVID-19 warnings were on Twitter well before the outbreak of the pandemic. Researchers have identified tracks of increasing concern about pneumonia cases on posts published on Twitter in seven countries, between the end of 2019 and the beginning of 2020

[Epidemiology] Early warnings of COVID-19 outbreaks across Europe were evident from social media in the winter season 2019â€“2020, before the first public announcements of local sources of infection were made, with unexpected levels of concerns about cases of pneumonia
